mapper.select: select id, title, description, imagefile, imageurl, useyn, DATE_FORMAT(createdat, '%y.%m.%d') createdat, DATE_FORMAT(updatedat, '%Y.%m.%d') updatedat from notice where UseYn = 'Y' order by id desc

select id, title, description, imagefile, imageurl, useyn, DATE_FORMAT(createdat, '%y.%m.%d') createdat, DATE_FORMAT(updatedat, '%Y.%m.%d') updatedat from notice where UseYn = 'Y' order by id desc limit 5

select id, title, description, imagefile, imageurl, useyn, DATE_FORMAT(createdat, '%y.%m.%d') createdat, DATE_FORMAT(updatedat, '%Y.%m.%d') updatedat from notice where id = ( select max(id) from notice where UseYn = 'Y' and id < #{id} )

select id, title, description, imagefile, imageurl, useyn, DATE_FORMAT(createdat, '%y.%m.%d') createdat, DATE_FORMAT(updatedat, '%y.%m.%d') updatedat from notice where id = ( select min(id) from notice where UseYn = 'Y' and id > #{id} )
mapper.insert: insert into notice (Title, description, imagefile, imageurl) values(#{title}, #{description}, #{imagefile}, #{imageurl});
mapper.update: update notice set useyn = 'N' where id = #{id}
